sensortoolkit._models.apply_correction.Individual_Correction¶

Individual_Correction(param=None, df_list=None, stats_df=None)[source]¶

Apply an individual correction to each sensor dataset based on the OLS regression slope and intercept values in the passed statistics dataframe.

Parameters

  • param (str) – The evaluation parameter.

  • df_list (list) – List of sensor dataframes.

  • stats_df (pandas dataframe) – Statistics dataframe containing OLS regression statisitcs including slope and intercept for either sensor vs. FRM/FEM regression or sensor vs. intersensor regression.

Returns

List of modified dataframes with column added for corrected parameter values.

Return type

df_list (list)

sensortoolkit
